sub_title: Strategy & Innovation meets IT Project Management
summary: A change and strategy visionary with passion for bringing people from different disciplines and state of art technologies together for achieving ambitious results. Specialized in delivering strategic change and managing transitions of complex corporate landscapes in the areas of finance, business operations and IT.  More than ten years of experience in leading business transformation, process optimization, ERP system implementations and IT project delivery.

publications.name: “Managerial framework for mediating the effect of organizational structure changes on effectiveness of ERP implementation. A case study of Canon Europa N.V.”

authors.headline: Strategy & Innovation meets IT Project Management

publications.name: “Does supply chain agility reduce the corporate impact of recessions? A case study of Hewlett-Packard and Jaguar Land Rover”

authors.headline: Strategy & Innovation meets IT Project Management

profile_positions.description:
•	Managed the innovation, development, change and release cycles of finance & risk applications. Mitigated the risks of complex projects related to IFRS and Solvency II requirements. Ensured high levels of service availability and improvement of KPIs in the areas of development, configuration management; change and incident management.
•	Managed high complexity functional dependencies and was responsible for risk mitigation plans ensuring zero disruption to IT and business critical operations during the release windows.
•	Coordinated critical change evaluations with data privacy, information security, architecture, cloud brokering and procurement departments.
•	Established the concept of multi-disciplinary team speeding up the change management process by about 50%; improved the engagement of all decision makers and the quality of decisions. 
•	Functionally guided a cross-discipline team of 18 developers, analysts, finance controllers. Improved team’s velocity and helped to prioritize development items in order to minimize risks.
•	Coached teams in agile methodologies and succeeded in helping them to deliver largest and most complex functional deliveries till now while under high resource and time pressure.
•	Enabled internal, external reporting, and transparency towards external auditors.
profile_positions.title: Finance Change/Release Manager

profile_positions.description: Responsible for a small team of change management consultants, whose primary responsibility was successfully rolling out a business process and IT application blueprint towards 12 Canon EMEA organisations, achieving buy-in/acceptance in the target organisations and transitioning the new processes into BAU. Additional tasks: setting change strategy and targets, managing and coaching the team to enable them to achieve their best performance in Finance/IT change delivery.
profile_positions.title: Finance/IT Change and Implementation Manager

profile_positions.description:
Primary responsibilities included managing IT application and business process changes in finance and accounting operations of Canon sales companies end-to-end, which often involved managing stakeholders and their expectations, required deep understanding of IT applications used, finance and supply chain processes in local departments across countries, their operational challenges and communicating in a persuasive and understandable way.

Was responsible for roll-out of indirect channel finance operations to Germany, Belgium and Netherlands in Oracle R12.

In addition, my activities include:

- Communicating anticipated changes in local operations, managing exceptions to Pan-
European policies and local ways of working
- Creating action plans and roadmaps for change management / deployment activities and raising confidence in the project across the countries
- Finance process analysis, change impact assessments, end user training and post-go-live support
- Executing demos and end user training
- Organizing user acceptance testing activities to support test managers and users, supporting issue resolution and solution / test result documentation
profile_positions.title: Finance/IT Change Manager
European Finance/IT Process Consultant

profile_positions.description:
As a member of the EDSM team at the Business Imaging Group Eduardas was responsible for ensuring the smooth and balanced flow of goods/services in the supply pipeline. Additionally, being part of the central EMEA operations control team required constantly aligning operations to the turbulent business environment and facilitating business transformation in a new direction. His activities included:

  - Supporting operational/coordination activities of the global tender with VW Group
  - Developing test scenarios and supporting UAT of new solutions, supporting projects
  - Participating in discussions with business stakeholders about company wide business process change 
  - Monitoring the sales volumes across different regional sales organizations and planning aggregate supply/manufacturing accordingly
  - Ensuring accurate forecast of future demand/supply and proactive monitoring
  - Solving/reporting intermediary system issues in Oracle, ICON SCP and Steelwedge ERP
  - Reporting the sales/stock/forecast information to Product Managers and supporting product discontinuation/introduction
  - Supply/demand planning of large format printer inks (300+ SKUs)

  Achievements:
- Fulfilled the role of a Business Process Consultant in mapping the EMEA S&OP processes/procedures in ARIS and reporting to senior management for a large scale change management project
- Participated in Global Canon Group S&OP meeting in October 2013
- Participated in DRUPA 2012 exhibition in Dusseldorf
- Shaped and developed requirements, fulfilled UAT and release to production for a Global system interface solution between Canon and Oce Technologies
- Developed requirements and monitored implementation of new BI tools
- Managed the end to end pipeline of products/services worth €10,640,000
profile_positions.title: European Demand and Supply Management Professional

profile_positions.description: Team management, external relations, trainee development, graduate recruitment, mentoring, developing enterprise skills, networking, business relations development
profile_positions.title: Vice President for Business Development

profile_positions.description: Responsible for Finance and Crediting of Business Entities within the Klaipeda region, client analysis, credit rating, taking care of everyday administration, customer relations and other crediting related tasks, English – Lithuanian translations of credit agreements.
profile_positions.title: Corporate Customer Team Intern
